list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Remove unused script kk.py
The file kk.py containing a matrix manipulation script has been removed. This script was not being utilized in the project, thus its removal helps reduce unnecessary clutter in the repository.

task.summary:
Add sorting functionality and update UI elements
Implemented the sorting functionality for student records allowing sorting by surname and birthdate. Updated the placement of the database connection button and status frame to improve UI layout. Modified breakpoint lines in the workspace configuration for better debugging.

Add sorting functionality for student records
Implemented sorting by surname (A-Z, Z-A) and birthdate in the student management system. Enhanced the user interface with a dropdown menu for sorting options, and integrated the sorting logic into the data fetching function. Updated workspace configuration to reflect these changes.

Add accent style to sort menu button
Updated the sort options dropdown to include an accent button style. This enhances the visual consistency and user interface aesthetics of the Student Management System. Also made minor adjustments to breakpoints and workspace configurations for better debugging and consistency.

Remove example.py and update Student Management System
Deleted the example.py file as it was no longer needed. Enhanced the Student Management System by adding CSV export functionality, an address field in the database, and improvements to error messages and GUI layout.

Remove example.py and update Student Management System
Deleted the example.py file as it was no longer needed. Enhanced the Student Management System by adding CSV export functionality, an address field in the database, and improvements to error messages and GUI layout.

Add screenshots, CSV export, and accent button styling
Uploaded new screenshots under the Screenshots directory for better documentation. Enhanced the Student Management System by adding CSV export functionality, new accent styles for buttons, and various UI improvements. Updated workspace configurations to reflect these changes and ensure better debugging support.

Add screenshots and update workspace config
Added detailed screenshots to the README for better documentation. Enhanced the Student Management System with CSV export functionality and new accent styles for buttons. Updated workspace configurations to reflect these changes and improve debugging support.

Add screenshots and update workspace config
Added detailed screenshots to the README for better documentation. Enhanced the Student Management System with CSV export functionality and new accent styles for buttons. Updated workspace configurations to reflect these changes and improve debugging support.

Add field validations and update UI labels
Introduced validation for empty fields, birthdate format, and sex input. Updated UI labels to specify required formats for birthdate and sex. Fixed minor bugs and improved user interaction messages.

Remove unused script kk.py
The file kk.py containing a matrix manipulation script has been removed. This script was not being utilized in the project, thus its removal helps reduce unnecessary clutter in the repository.
